status_effects.status_description: Increases chance of dealing higher damage through improved damage roll probability.
Enhanced critical hit chance with escalating damage multipliers.
Chance to significantly reduce incoming damage through defensive positioning.
50% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks.
Physical power increased by 20%, enhancing attack damage and effectiveness.
Gain additional action point and increased maximum stamina for sustained combat.
Supernatural speed grants an extra action point per turn.
Gradual health restoration over time through magical or natural recovery.
Reduced sensitivity to damage and improved resistance to debilitating effects.
Enhanced understanding of mystical forces improves magical abilities.
Amplified magical energy increases the potency of all spell casting.
Improved focus and technique enhances ranged combat effectiveness.
Emanates poisonous aura that damages nearby enemies based on their health.
Cursed with poor fortune, increasing chance of dealing reduced damage.
Suffering from toxins that cause continuous damage over time.
Temporarily incapacitated and unable to take actions.
Reduced combat effectiveness and diminished damage output.
Reduced movement speed and action economy due to hindered mobility.
Increased vulnerability to damage and reduced defensive capabilities.
Maximum health capacity reduced, limiting healing potential.
